topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5477dcff63687219fc050100#post_5477dcff63687219fc050100
I sort of keep track with Kamen Rider; I've only managed to finished Fourze so far, but there's the good kind of cheesy and then there's the bad kind of cheesy.  Like if someone were to chain me to a chair and force me to watch Batman the brave and bold I would run out of their still attached to the chair rather than watch that show.  If a show is more tongue in cheek and doesn't try to make the watcher try to take the show super seriously I can at least sit through it, but shows or movies that are cheesy and then go "stop laughing guys, we're trying to be serious *honks clown nose*" that irritates me more than anything.
